ygData.subject: The Skinny on how to start the PeaceKeeper Staff Quest (not a spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ok first you have to be in GOOD with the paladins guild in Eurdian :) (helps if you worship the Tranquil god) go around and Hail the guild members and one
ygData.messageBody:
> i Hope he is on Veeshan, ill snatch that gem asap. or better yet, give us
> the skinny on how to pick it up :)
> Lan

Ok first you have to be in GOOD with the paladins guild in Eurdian :) (helps if
you worship the Tranquil god)
go around and Hail the guild members and one will ask if you want to retive the
peacekeeper staff or Hunt undead

well you should know how to handle this from here :)

Arrurm (the poor sucker that started this topic)
Veeshan magi
